altername_name: Pine View: A Southern Golf Tradition
name: Play Golf: Pineview Southern Golf Tradition
overview: Sharpen your skills or learn to play golf on the world famous gold course, Pine View. Each hole of this southern course, located in the sand hills, has been drawn exactly to scale with sand traps, water hazards, trees, bushes, rough and out-of-bound areas. Great fun and an exciting challenge.
